tool_description: Harness the potential of ChatGPT ( with internet access ), Google BARD AI (PALM 2) , LLAMA 2 70b , MPT 30b  (Open source LLMs  , Large Language Models ) , Falcon , AI coder , AI Chat bot APIs  ,Text to Image (DALL-E) , Text to Speech ( TTS ) .  Also get question answer , sentiment analysis, spam detection, summarization, text to headline (title), Paraphrasing, Embedding, NER ( named entity recognition ) and message completions ( text completion, Text prediction ) . Empower your applications ...
name: OPEN AI
title: OPEN AI

api_list.name: Bard AI (PALM 2)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://open-ai21.p.rapidapi.com/conversationpalm2"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "open-ai21.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Question - Answer
api_list.description: Our Context-Based Question Answering API provides a robust solution for answering questions based on given contexts or passages. By utilizing advanced natural language processing techniques, our API can understand the nuances of the context and accurately generate relevant answers to user queries. Whether you're building a virtual assistant, a knowledge base system, or any application that requires intelligent question answering, our API can assist you. Integrate our Context-Based Question Answering API to empower your applications with the ability to provide accurate and context-aware answers, enhancing user engagement and improving the overall user experience.

api_list.name: Summarization (ChatGPT )
api_list.description: Our Summarization API is a powerful tool designed to provide comprehensive and condensed summaries of lengthy documents. Using advanced natural language processing algorithms, our API extracts the most important information from the text and generates concise summaries that capture the key points. By integrating our Summarization API into your applications, you can streamline content analysis, save time, and enable users to quickly grasp the main ideas of lengthy articles, reports, or research papers. Unlock the power of efficient summarization, enhance information retrieval, and improve the user experience with our state-of-the-art Summarization API.

api_list.name: Text Completion
api_list.description:
Try Standalone APIs at cheaper rate at - https://rapidapi.com/user/rphrp1985
Our Text Completion API provides a powerful solution for generating accurate and contextually relevant suggestions to enhance user experience. By leveraging advanced natural language processing techniques, our API predicts and suggests the most likely next words or phrases based on the input text. Whether you're building a chatbot, a writing assistant, or any application that requires text completion, our API can assist you in generating fluent and coherent suggestions that seamlessly integrate with the user's input. Integrate our Text Completion API into your applications to provide users with smart and efficient text completion capabilities, enhancing productivity and improving the overall user experience.

api_list.name: Text to Headline (ChatGPT)
api_list.description: Our Text-to-Headline API is a cutting-edge tool that generates concise and attention-grabbing headlines from given text. By leveraging advanced natural language processing techniques, our API can distill lengthy articles, blog posts, or any text content into compelling and informative headlines. With our API, you can streamline content curation, enhance user engagement, and drive traffic to your platform. Incorporate our Text-to-Headline API into your applications to automatically generate captivating headlines that capture the essence of your text and captivate your audience's attention. Elevate your content creation process with the power of our Text-to-Headline API and stand out in the crowded digital landscape.

parameters.name: text
parameters.default: FOR THE past 18 days, about seven battalions of the Assam Rifles deployed in south Manipur have not received fresh ration with people in Meitei areas allegedly blocking supplies from reaching the camps of the force.  The Meiteis have been accusing the Assam Rifles, the longest-serving paramilitary force in the state, of being partisan and siding with the Kukis in the ongoing conflict. Meitei groups have accused the Assam Rifles of supporting illegal poppy cultivation in the Kuki-dominated hills, turning a blind eye to “illegal immigration” of Kuki-Chin tribes from Myanmar and not acting with alacrity to save Meitei villages from arson during the initial days of the conflict last month.

utterances.utterance: Generate a headline for this article about the recent developments in the Assam Rifles and Meitei conflict.

parameters.text: FOR THE past 18 days, about seven battalions of the Assam Rifles deployed in south Manipur have not received fresh ration with people in Meitei areas allegedly blocking supplies from reaching the camps of the force. The Meiteis have been accusing the Assam Rifles, the longest-serving paramilitary force in the state, of being partisan and siding with the Kukis in the ongoing conflict. Meitei groups have accused the Assam Rifles of supporting illegal poppy cultivation in the Kuki-dominated hills, turning a blind eye to “illegal immigration” of Kuki-Chin tribes from Myanmar and not acting with alacrity to save Meitei villages from arson during the initial days of the conflict last month.

api_list.name: Text Embedding
api_list.description: Our Text Embedding API offers advanced capabilities for transforming textual data into numerical representations. By leveraging state-of-the-art natural language processing techniques, our API can encode text into high-dimensional vectors that capture the semantic meaning and relationships between words and phrases. These embeddings can be used for a variety of applications, including semantic search, text classification, and information retrieval. By integrating our Text Embedding API into your applications, you can enhance the understanding and analysis of text data, enabling more accurate and insightful processing. Leverage the power of text embedding to unlock the potential of your text-based applications with our advanced API.

api_list.name: Named Entity Recognition and Entity Linking
api_list.description: Our NER (Named Entity Recognition) and Entity Linking API extracts meaningful information from text. NER identifies and classifies named entities like people, organizations, and locations. Entity Linking connects these entities to external knowledge bases. By leveraging advanced algorithms, we provide structured data and contextual information, empowering applications with accurate insights. Enhance data analysis, improve search capabilities, and unlock the full potential of text-based applications with our efficient NER and Entity Linking API.

parameters.text: Amazon was founded by Jeff Bezos in 1994.

parameters.text: The Great Wall of China is a historic structure located in China.

api_list.name: Spam Ham Detection
api_list.description: Our Spam and Ham Detection API is a powerful tool designed to identify and classify incoming messages as either spam or legitimate (ham). Leveraging advanced machine learning techniques, our API accurately detects and filters out unwanted spam messages, ensuring that your users receive only relevant and genuine content. By integrating our Spam and Ham Detection API into your applications, you can enhance user experience, improve data security, and streamline communication processes. Trust our reliable and efficient solution to effectively identify and handle spam, allowing you to focus on meaningful interactions and protect your users from unwanted distractions.

api_list.name: Sentiment Analysis
api_list.description: Our Sentiment Analysis API offers a powerful solution to analyze the emotional tone of text content. Using advanced natural language processing techniques, our API accurately detects and classifies sentiment as positive, negative, or neutral. By leveraging machine learning algorithms, we provide valuable insights into customer opinions, feedback, and social media sentiment. Integrate our Sentiment Analysis API into your applications to gain a deeper understanding of user sentiment, enhance customer experience, and make data-driven decisions. Unlock the power of sentiment analysis and leverage valuable insights to drive your business forward.
